title: 75/162. Enlargement of the Executive Committee of the Programme of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees

paragraphs.1: Decides to increase the number of members of the Executive Committee of the Programme of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees from 106 States to 107 States;
paragraphs.2: Requests the Economic and Social Council to elect the additional member at a meeting of its management segment in 2021.
